articles.title: Men with Stage IV breast cancer who are receptive to systemic therapy benefit from surgery - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: Men with Stage IV breast cancer and known estrogen (ER) and progesterone receptor (PR) status benefit from surgical intervention and from trimodal therapy (systemic therapy, surgery, and radiation), according to a study presented at the virtual American Colle…
